title: Mith grapple (unf)

properties.name: description
properties.value: This Mith grapple is an unfinished version of a normal mith grapple - a mith grapple tip attached to a mithril bolt. To make a mith grapple level 59 Smithing is required to smith the mith grapple tip from mithril bars as well as level 59 Fletching which is required to attach the tips to mithril bolts. The final step is to attach a rope to the unfinished mith grapple to make a completed mith grapple which can be used with grapple shortcuts. Grapples are tradeable at every stage of construction. Originally grapples were untradeable making shortcuts unusable for players that had the required shortcut levels but not the required Smithing and Fletching levels.

Item ID9418

This Mith grapple is an unfinished version of a normal mith grapple - a mith grapple tip attached to a mithril bolt. To make a mith grapple level 59 Smithing is required to smith the mith grapple tip from mithril bars as well as level 59 Fletching which is required to attach the tips to mithril bolts. The final step is to attach a rope to the unfinished mith grapple to make a completed mith grapple which can be used with grapple shortcuts. Grapples are tradeable at every stage of construction. Originally grapples were untradeable making shortcuts unusable for players that had the required shortcut levels but not the required Smithing and Fletching levels.

[[File:Mith grapple (unf) detail.png|left|130px]]
This '''Mith grapple''' is an unfinished version of a normal [[mith grapple]] - a [[mith grapple tip]] attached to a [[mithril bolts|mithril bolt]]. To make a mith grapple level 59 [[Smithing]] is required to smith the mith grapple tip from [[mithril bar]]s as well as level 59 [[Fletching]] which is required to attach the tips to mithril bolts. The final step is to attach a [[rope]] to the unfinished mith grapple to make a completed mith grapple which can be used with grapple shortcuts. Grapples are [[tradeable]] at every stage of construction. Originally grapples were untradeable making shortcuts unusable for players that had the required shortcut levels but not the required Smithing and Fletching levels.
